From 19.-21.11.2024 we are represented as BEARS at the Space Expo. 
You will find us in the University Pavilion. We look forward to seeing you in large numbers and are sure to be able to present you with great exhibits. 
Feel free to write to us if you would like to meet us directly or make an appointment.

See you there!
